column1: Please add the name of the field in column A, select the field type in column B, whether it should be optional or required in column C, and whether it should be visible to loan officers in column D.
Please use the dropdown values in columns B through D to make those selections
Please tell us where on the request record the new field should be placed (ie. "in the right column under Lending Group")
If adding a new dropdown field, please also add the name of the field to columns AB and beyond in the Dropdown Values tab along with the associated dropdown values.
THE FOLLOWING FIELDS ARE ONLY ON THE DETAIL/EDIT VIEW
